Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HelpControl

    public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Control is the class to represent one functionality that the user can enact

    Controls connect a string or char name of a control to an action that can be completed such as "go","speak","do", etc

    Since:
    12/21/2020
    Author:
    b4knah

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean available
      The boolean value to keep track of whether or not this Control can be used
      java.lang.String controlName
      The friendly name of this control
      java.lang.String desc
      The user-friendly description of this control
      private Runner functionality
      The anonymous function that will be executed when this control is activated
      char oneChar
      The one-character name of this control

    • Constructor Detail

      • Control

        public Control(java.lang.String controlName,
               java.lang.String desc,
               char oneChar,
               boolean available,
               Runner functionality)
        Constructor for a Control
        Parameters:
        controlName - The name of the control
        desc - The description to be presented to the user
        oneChar - The one-character name of the control
        available - A boolean value of whether or not the control can be used
        functionality - The anonymous function that will be executed when this control is activated
